question: [File: aptos-core/ecosystem/indexer-grpc/indexer-grpc-manager/src/config.rs] [Struct: IndexerGrpcManagerConfig] [SSRF via peer addresses] Can grpc_manager_addresses at line 38 point to internal services (e.g., localhost, 169.254.169.254), enabling SSRF attacks to access cloud metadata or internal APIs?
